discourse_list.title: Best Summary of the Current State of the Community?

content.content: Hello, and thank you to everyone who’s obviously worked extremely hard in this community.  The Core Principles are certainly something I can support, and more importantly, what I have seen so far makes me optimistic that the community is actually striving to execute on those principles. I’ve been reading a lot trying to get caught up, but many of the sources, including those linked one or two levels down from the governance front-end at vote.makerdao.com, are redundant or worse, out of date.  For example, under Governance, there’s a long discussion of the Maker Foundation-- Maker Foundation | MakerDAO Community Portal --but I understand from a blog post last year-- » MakerDAO Has Come Full Circle – that the Foundation is being/has been dissolved.  Lot’s of other tidbits here and there seem subtly (but importantly!) out of date. Could anyone point me to the best “State of the DAO” that I can use as a jumping off point as I keep reading up on things? Thanks!
